Panzer::

Her optics lit up to full intensity as she woke up. She sat up on the 
table and looked around. It was as if she had just been made and woke 
up for the very first time. She stood up and opened her 
comlink. "Commander Shivah, I am ready to take orders."

She shwished her long black velvety tail behind her. She reached for 
her side arm, but found the compartment empty. "Hmm, perhaps I have 
not yet been issued a weapon yet."  She stood near the table, waiting 
for a responce from her leader. 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
